description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a and fore edge. Physical description: 31 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Mild staining. Origin: 28 Muḥarram 1263 H [16 January 1847], by Muḥammad al-Kadkanī (leaf 260b). Same scribe as New Series no. 475q. Incipit: من اركان الصلوة في بقية الصلوت وفيه فصول
author: Najafī, Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Bāqir, approximately 1788-1850
abstract: Commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām; contains kitāb al-ṣalāh.
extent: 260 leaves : paper ; 305 x 207 (220 x 130) mm bound to 305 x 211 mm
uniform_title: Jawāhir al-kalām fī sharḥ Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Kitāb al-ṣalāh
جواهر الكلام في شرح شرائع الاسلام. كتاب الصلوة
creator: Najafī, Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Bāqir, approximately 1788-1850
نجفي، محمد حسن بن باقر، approximately 1788-1850
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Sharāʼiʻ al-Islām.
binding_note: Contemporary full black leather with blind-stamped central mandorla and pendants; corners and spine repaired with maroon leather; blue pastedowns and flyleaves.
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 358q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
